thread.title: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals
thread.title_full: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals

author: wtopstaff
title: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals
text:
By The Associated Press October 17, 2015 5:37 am Samantha Stosur of Australia hits a return shot against Angelique Kerber of Germany during their semifinal match at the WTA Hong Kong Open tennis tournament in Hong Kong, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Kin Cheung) 
HONG KONG (AP) — Angelique Kerber of Germany beat fifth-seeded Samantha Stosur 6-2, 6-2 Saturday in the Hong Kong Open semifinals to move within one win of cementing her place in the WTA Finals in Singapore. 
The second-seeded Kerber plays the winner of the other semifinal between Venus Williams and Jelena Jankovic. 
Kerber can ensure she is part of the WTA Finals if she wins the Hong Kong Open. 
Stosur had staged a remarkable comeback against Heather Watson in the quarterfinals by winning 11 straight games but the Australian couldn’t find the same touch against Kerber. 
Kerber is chasing her fifth WTA singles title this year after victories in Charleston, Stuttgart, Birmingham and Stanford. Topics:
